page.title: 10A day in the life of Dean.
page.content: On Sunday I woke up at 8.15 a.m. and read until 8.45 a.m. Then I got up and went downstairs. I switched on the television but there was nothing interesting so I listened to the radio. At 9.OO a.m. I made myself breakfast and then I washed and dressed. At 9.45 a.m. I went with my dad to feed the cats at the place where he works. When we came back I played outside until dinner time. For dinner we had roast beef, potatoes and vegetables. At 2.OO p.m. I helped my dad clean the fish pond. Then we went in for tea. At 4.45 p.m. I helped my dad mend my bicycle. In the evening I played snooker and watched television. Before bed I had a bath and washed my hair. I went to bed at 9.3O p.m., read for half an hour and fell asleep at 1O.15 p.m.
